summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein, Mary E. Erdoes, and Jes Staley discussing a proposal related to a deal. Epstein expresses concerns about the execution of the deal and requests a real proposal. The email highlights the confidential nature of the communication.
